alert.note: Alert for Lincoln County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 14 at 3:22AM PST until January 15 at 4:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 4 AM PST SUNDAY ABOVE 5000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 5000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. South winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Lincoln County north of Pioche above 5000 feet. * WHEN...From 4 PM today to 4 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be hazardous. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Accumulating snow between 3 and 5 inches is possible on Highway 93 north of Pioche, State Route 319 east of Panaca, and State Route 322 north of Ursine, resulting in hazardous road conditions.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow-covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
